ygData.subject: Re: Happy little bard  I am
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow, grats Jacana! You now have something that is still on my wish list to go get.  I am just not patient enough to go through the spawns to make that thing
ygData.messageBody:
Wow, grats Jacana! You now have something that is still on my "wish"
list to go get. I am just not patient enough to go through the
spawns to make that thing trigger...that and I totally get lost in
FM's hehe. Just seems to be the one zone I can't memorize the layout
to just yet.

Rosha Cristi, Bard of 51 {insert something musical here}
Guild Leader, Legends
Innoruuk

--- In eqbards@egroups.com, "Cheryl Kiraly" <cheryl@s...> wrote:
> Sunday Night (Australia) I was hunting with a group in Frontier
Mountains
> when a shout came up about some ac 16 arm items that dropped. The
loc was
> given and off I ran. Needless to say along the way I died *grin*
>
> In trying to fetch my corpse I almost cried. The power was
flickering a bit
> and kept disconnecting the modem. *sigh* But I made it- I got my
corpse.
> And visited over there a few times with the natives of Frontier
Mountain
> close behind.
>
> A bit later a shout came up that the sleeves would drop again. Ok
attempt
> two. I could not go much worse I thought. Then all of the sudden
there was
> the corpse at my feet at the Giant Fort. And the sleeves were
mine. Seems
> the local druid felt bad that I died the first time and made sure I
could
> get the sleeves again.
>
> I am now the proud owner of a pair of the Sleeves of the Ancients :)
>
> Oh yea :) And I made 28 Sunday and am merrily on my way to 29. I
love those
> giants :) Slow exp but I am starting to make money again!
>
> Jacana Mourningsong
> Wood Elf of the 28th Song
> <Crimson Dragons> on Innoruuk
